message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm confident that you will see the potential in it. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. This price reflects the significant value I see in the product and the potential benefits it could bring to your business. Of course, I understand this is a significant investment, so please feel free to ask any questions you may have. Let's discuss further to see if this is a good fit for you.
